review: This is an awesome product. I am a mac head and I chose this over the Apple TV since it was super simple to set up and is compatible with every device I have. I have a mixture of mac and android products and it works beautifully and seamlessly without hassle. I would highly recommend getting one for every TV in the house!

review: The Chromecast media player keeps on getting better over time. I find myself using this for watching Youtube channels and also Netflix. The Netflix and Youtube apps are easier to flip through compared to a Roku which i also have and use. I do love the fact I can now mirror my Android phone screen to my tv using Chromecast, say if I wanted to show off the photos on my phone or videos too.
